text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Everyone knows Trump mismanaged COVID-19 bc he was afraid it might hurt his poll numbers. 

He still does by obstructing testing.

Trump’s a narcissistic, psychopathic monster. He has been the worst president in history.
